content: संनह् {c4c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To tie, bind, fasten. {@--2@} To wear, put on, dress. {@--3@} To put on (as armour), arm oneself, be accoutred; समनात्सीत्ततो सैन्यं <ls>Bk. 15. 111</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 15.">112</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">14. 7</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">16. 4</ls>. {@--4@} To make oneself ready, prepare oneself (for any action) (<ab>Atm.</ab> in this sense); युद्धाय संनह्यते <ls>Mbh.</ls>; छेत्तुं वज्रमणीञ् शिरीषकुसुमप्रांतेन संनह्यते <ls>Bk. 2. 6.</ls>
